For three years, the energy industry has been eliminating the consequences of shelling, repairing and restoring light in the homes of Ukrainians. Shelling, fires, destruction... but the will is not broken. The Ukrainian flag will definitely return to every temporarily occupied power plant. It's only a matter of time. Let's persevere. Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ•¯ Nikopol: a DTEK energy engineer was killed during the shell...
Description: ğŸ•¯Nikopol: a DTEK energy engineer was killed during Russian shelling. A great tragedy for the entire family of Ukrainian energy workers. Yesterday, the Russian occupiers killed our colleague Gennadiy Musatov. Together with the brigade, Gennadiy came to restore power grids damaged by shelling. The occupiers fired a second artillery strike and hit a mobile crane driven by our colleague. Gennady Musatov was 56 years old, 20 of which he devoted to the profession of energy. There are no words to describe the pain. Deep condolences to relatives, friends, colleagues, everyone who knew and loved Gennady. Eternal and bright memory to everyone who died during the battle for light...

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ’¡Odeszine: the enemy attacked the energy facility DTEK On the...
Description: ğŸ’¡Odesshchyna: the enemy attacked the DTEK energy facility. On the night of February 18, the enemy once again attacked the Odesa region. Some homes in Odesa and the Odesa district remained without electricity. In the morning, power companies restored power to almost 15,000 families, restoring them from backup lines where possible. As soon as the energy workers receive permission from the rescuers, they will begin to eliminate the consequences of the attack. The priority is the restoration of power supply for critical infrastructure, including thermal facilities. â—ï¸Repair works will continue around the clock until the light returns to every home of Odessa residents and residents of the region. The battle for light continues. Believe in energy workers ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦
